name: stylishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows high quality in appearance, design, or behaviour: stylishly dressed Hardly anyone plays this piece of music so stylishly. See
stylish
More examplesFewer examplesThe production was stylishly produced and well performed.She dresses stylishly and lives in a beautifully decorated Victorian house.her stylishly written new novel
